name: Argon Assault (KingPranav4858)
description:
You are a warrior in a city called Argon. One day, spaceships from the enemy planet start invading Argon. It is your duty to save the planet from the enemy invasion. Will you be able to do it? You have a commander to help you(not really, all he does is get scared!).

Controls: 

W - Move Up

S - Move Down

A - Move Left

D - Move Right
